title.rendered: Uni Air in Zhongshan, Taipei, Taiwan.

content.rendered:
UNI Air is a regional airline based in Zhongshan, Taipei, Taiwan. With an operation focus on domestic routes, UNI Air is a subsidiary of Evergreen Group, making it a sister airline of the mainline operator EVA Air. It was known as Makung Airlines until 1996, when EVA Air took a majority share of the airline. In 1998, the airline merged with Great China Airlines and Taiwan Airways, which EVA Air also had interests in, to form UNI Airways (UNI Air).

Uni Air in Zhongshan, Taipei, Taiwan Contact Address, Phone, Email, Working hours and Website

Address: 8th Floor, No 117 Chang An East Road, Section 2, Taipei, 104, Taiwan

Phone number: 886-2-25086999 (domestic route)
886-2-25011999 (regional route)

FAX: +886 2 2513 1300

Email ID: communication@uniair.com.tw

Uni Air Official website: https://www.uniair.com.tw/

Uni Air Online Check-in: https://www.uniair.com.tw/rwd/B2C/service/checkin/uck_login.aspx

Note: UNI Air online Check-in opens from 24 hours and closes 2 hours before scheduled flight departure time.

Check Uni Air schedule here: https://www.uniair.com.tw/rwd/flight-info/search.aspx?type=timetable

Check Uni Air flight status here: https://www.uniair.com.tw/rwd/flight-info/search.aspx?type=flight_status

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Uni Air

Total fleet: 15

  • Airbus A321-200
  • ATR 72-600

Uni Air Baggage Allowance

View Uni Air Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Special Assistance in Uni Air

Traveling while Pregnant in Uni Air

  • Healthy women less than 32 weeks pregnant are allowed to board the aircraft.
  • Healthy women who are 32 to 36 weeks pregnant and hold a fit-for-air-travel certificate
  • Women who are more than 36 weeks pregnant are not allowed to board the aircraft.

For more details: https://www.uniair.com.tw/rwd/CMS/service/special_needs##a4

Traveling with Pets in Uni Air

  • Only cats, dogs, rabbits, turtles, frogs and insects are accepted for carriage. Poisonous, offensive animal
    may not be accepted for carriage.
    For more details: https://www.uniair.com.tw/rwd/CMS/service/luggage_information##a4

Queries handled by Uni Air Customer care:

Flight Ticket Booking, Ticket Cancellation, Flight Ticket Rescheduling, Ok to Board, Visa Services, Online Check-in, Baggage Allowance, Duty Free Allowance, Flight Information, Airport Lounges, Visa Information, In-Flight Meals, Airport Transfers, Missing Luggage, Immigration Services, Valet Parking, Meet and Greet, Flight Wifi, Airport Wifi, In-Flight Entertainment, Airport Facilities, Delayed Flights, Visa on Arrival, First Class, Business Class, Economy Class, Infinity MileageLands

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Uni Air in Zhongshan, Taipei, Taiwan Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Uni Air in Zhongshan, Taipei, Taiwan: (click on the stars below)
